text:
January 27, 1900.
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
119

LARGEST STOCK IN THE UNITED KINGDOM. PRICES AND SIZES POST FREE.
JOSEPH SANDELL & CO.
MOULDINGS.
TIMBER IMPORTERS.
15 WATERLOO ROAD, LAMBETH, S.E.
JOINERY OF EVERY DESCRIPTION.
Telegraphic Address: Sandell Company, London.
Telephone No. 4690.

Aberlay—Bordeaux—900 lds. pitwood—Ebbw Vale Co., Ltd.
18 Petre Aleide—Redon—188 lds. pitwood—Watts, Williams & Co.
Bella Formigoja—Oporto—500 lds. pitwood—F. R. Howe
Rollo—Risoer—490 lds. hewn fir—G. W. Jones, Heard & Co.
Deux Empereurs—Bordeaux—115 lds. pitwood—Budd & Co.
19 Marie Celine—Quimper—115 lds. pitwood—G. W. Jones, Heard & Co.
Irma—l'Orient—75 lds. pitwood—G. W. Jones, Heard & Co.
Goldcliffe (s)—Bordeaux—960 lds. pitwood—Cardiff & Newport Pitwood Co.
22 Lovart (s)—Bordeaux—840 lds. pitwood—Budd & Co.

SOUTHAMPTON.
Jan. 19 Para (s)—Jamaica—976 pcs. 40 tons lancewood spars—Royal Mail S.Pk. Co.

SUNDERLAND.
Jan. 16 Ascania (s)—Stolpemunde—330 lds. beechwood chocks—E. Wiener & Co.; 57 lds. beechwood chocks—Pyman, Bell & Co.
19 Carl Imenas—Grimstad—5 lds. spars—H. Morch & Co.

SWANSEA.
Jan. 19 Emilie (s)—Bordeaux—[?] lds. pitwood—Sevestre & Co.
20 Sanglier—Pauillac—220 lds. pitwood—Davies & Co.
Tana (s)—Lisbon—1,230 lds. pitwood—Burgess & Co., Ltd.
22 Niobe (s)—Bordeaux—292 lds. pitwood—W. Davies & Co.

YARMOUTH.
16 Lingfield—Pensacola—1,513 lds. sawn pitch pine—Jewson & Sons.

TYNE.
Vega (s)—Trondhjem, &c.—57 lds. battens, 55 lds. boards, 40 brls. dry wood pulp.
Newton (s)—Uddevalla—36,916 pcs. mining sleepers—Osbeck & Co.
Munin (s)—Gothenburg—360 lds. deals, battens and boards, 15 lds. splits, 110 lds. props.
Prospero—Christiania, &c.—1,252 pcs. mining timber, 560 brls. wood pulp, 15,090 props, 1,232 bdls. box-boards.
Union (s)—Fredrikstad—59,034 pcs. floorings, 2,272 battens.
Christian IX.—Kragero—16,696 pcs. props, 3,380 sleepers, 3,277 crown trees.
Foldin (s)—Christiania—2,621 pcs. mining timber, 14,441 planed boards, 1,957 brls. wood pulp.
Ragvald Jarl (s)—Trondhjem—180 lds. battens.
Adela—Huelva—[?]

IRELAND.
BELFAST.
Jan. 17 Jorgen Olsen—Moss (Norway)—616 lds. planed fir—Crawford, Browne & Co.

ROBERT PARKER & CO.,
Importers of Greenheart,
And of Teak, Quebec Pine, Red Pine, Oak, Elm, Spruce Deals, Flooring Boards, Hewn and Sawn Pitch Pine, and other Timber.
Telegraphic & Cable Address: "PENSACOLA, LIVERPOOL."
Telephone No. 2,617.
15, CANADA DOCK, LIVERPOOL.
A large selection of Greenheart of various sizes, specially adapted for Pier Work and Dock Engineering Purposes always on hand.

16 Torr Head (s)—New Orleans—12 lds. staves, 23 lds. poplar logs, 405 lds. sawn lumber—G. Heyn & Sons.
20 Dunmore Head (s)—St. John, N.B.—937 lds. deals—G. Heyn & Sons.
22 Inishowen Head (s)—Galveston—15 lds. sawn pine—G. Heyn & Sons.

DUBLIN.
Jan. 10 Malin Head—New Orleans—31,080 pine boards, 68,224 oak staves—B. Allen & Co.
15 Bengore Head—St. John—17,653 deals.

IMPORTS OF MAHOGANY, HARDWOODS, &c.
LIVERPOOL.
ALEXANDRA DOCK.
Jan. 20 Sagamore (s)—Boston—459 bdls. 857 pcs. lumber—M.R. Co.; 2,362 bdls. staves, 1,850 butt staves.
Noranmore (s)—Norfolk, Va.—3,515 pcs. oak lumber, 395 bdls. and 167 pcs. poplar, 5,047 pcs. walnut—Saxton & Co.; 1 car. oak lumber—H. C. Spangler; 1 car. oak lumber—Cobbett & Co.; 1 car. poplar lumber—Munro, Brice & Co.; 3,449 pcs. walnut—Knoxville Saw Mill Co.; 1,712 pcs. walnut—J. H. Burrell & Co.; 29 ash logs, 1,178 pcs. ash—A. Main; 400 oak scantlings, 300 oak planks, 899 ash logs, 34 poplar logs, 656 pcs. persimmon wood, 438 pcs. dog-wood, 2,279 pcs. oak lumber, 3 cars oak lumber, 275 bdls. poplar lumber, 2,283 pcs. lumber.
22 Lancastrian (s)—Boston—4 cs. 1 brl. pulleys, 329 sks. handles, 859 hh.l. staves.
Lake Superior (s)—St. John—239 pcs. oak lumber—J. Kennedy & Co.; 134 sks. 28 cs. handles, 578 shafts, 82 bdls. sticks—Sutherland, Innes & Co.
23 Roman (s)—Portland, Me.—3,297 pine deals.
Tampican (s)—New Orleans—85 hickory logs—Hughes, Treleaven & Co.; 16,967 staves, 3,110 w.i. hd. staves, 107 ash logs, 3,407 pcs. oak lumber, 3,700 planks, 500 hickory billets, 137 pkgs. shuttle bocks, 1,770 pcs. gum, 498 pcs. ash, 2,492 pcs. s.w., 650 pcs. poplar, 2,024 pcs. cotton wood, 338 pcs. pine lumber, 67 oak, 10 gum, 16 round ash and 13 poplar logs, 3,304 pipe staves.
24 Vancouver (s)—Portland, Me.—881 pcs. black walnut—J. Kennedy & Co.; 1 cs. handles—A. Bond & Co.

CANADA DOCK.
Jan. 18 Sylvania (s)—Boston—399 pcs. lumber—Duncan, Ewing & Co.; 8,400 pcs. lumber, 998 bdls. hhd. staves, 200 bdls. shooks, 146 staves, 661 bdls. walnut.
20 Tauric (s)—New York—936 pcs. lumber, 1,168 w.o. planks, 1,900 brls. staves, 4 crts. handles, 11 crts. wheels.
Lucania (s)—New York—2,800 staves, 46 logs cocobolo wood.

GARSTON DOCK.
Jan. 19 Galatea (s)—Treport—450 tons beech logs—Wilson Bros. Bobbin Co.

HORNBY DOCK.
Jan. 19 Persiana (s)—Boston—854 bdls. pine & Mitchells; 2,400 head staves—G. Heyn & Sons.
20 Roman (s)—Baltimore—34 poplar logs, 1,815 pcs. oak lumber—Kennedy & Co.; 19 poplar, 303 walnut, 46 hickory logs, 3,578 w.o. boards—Farnworth & Jardine; 953 y.p. boards, 19 white ash logs—J. Gardner & Sons; 69 walnut logs—W. Conway & Co.; 9 cars lumber—L. C. Hay; 142 pcs. oak lumber, 1,132 pcs. 450 bdls. shooks—R. Webster & Co.; 3 cars hardwood—J. Coltart & Bro.; 51 w.o. planks—Illingworth, Ingham & Co.; 13 poplar, 25 walnut, 165 hickory, and 35 maple logs, 9,094 pcs. 5 cars oak lumber, 1 car, 2,786 pcs. 77 bdls. poplar lumber, 1,563 pcs. walnut lumber; 5,250 hhd. staves, 1,399 w.o. planks, 589 bdls. handles, 486 oak planks.

LANGTON DOCK.
Jan. 18 Westland (s)—Philadelphia—310 bdls. poplar lumber—R. McLean; 411 oak logs, 361 bdls. hickory cuttings—McArthur & Co.; 10 oak logs, 22 poplar, 8 ash logs.

WELLINGTON DOCK.
Jan. 19 Westland (s)—Odessa—30 oak butts—Banks & Co.; 10 oak logs, 22 beech.
24 Westmoreland (s)—Hamburg—8 logs mahogany.

TOXTETH DOCK.
Jan. 18 Oron (s)—W. C. Africa—from Lagos—300 logs mahogany; from Axim—76 logs mahogany; from Half Assinee—134 logs mahogany, all for sundry consignees.
22 Gracia (s)—Pensacola—4,768 pcs. oak staves—Tagart, Beaton & Co.; 522 pcs. poplar, 5,062 pcs. and 2,199 pcs. walnut lumber, 426 pcs. oak lumber, 89 cs. handles.
Lancashire (s)—Rangoon—338 teak planks, 4,075 teak short scantlings, 1,300 full and half-blocks—Duncan, Ewing & Co.; 415 teak scantlings, 1,364 teak blocks.
Orion (s)—Bangkok—334 teak planks, 30,000 teak keys, 520 teak squares.
24 Craftsman (s)—New Orleans—5,088 hd. staves, 3 cars oak lumber—E. Alcott; 2,132 pcs. oak lumber—Illingworth, Ingham & Co.; 347 hd. staves.
Dalmally (s)—New Orleans—4 cars oak staves.
Jan. 20 Ellison (s)—Mobile, Ala.—2,000 pipe staves.

LONDON.
MILLWALL DOCKS.
Jan. 22 Tropic (s)—Norfolk—1,918 pcs. and poplar lumber—Tagart, Beaton & Co.
